verses.verse: And Solomon<WH8010> determined<WH559> to build<WH1129> an house<WH1004> for the name<WH8034> of the Lord<WH3068>, and an house<WH1004> for his kingdom<WH4438>.

And Solomon<WH8010> told out<WH5608> sixty and ten<WH7657> thousand<WH505> men<WH376> to carry burdens<WH5449>, and eighty<WH8084> thousand<WH505> to hew<WH2672> in the mountain<WH2022>, and three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> to oversee them<WH5329>.

And Solomon<WH8010> sent<WH7971> to Huram<WH2361> the king<WH4428> of Tyre<WH6865>, saying<WH559>, As you did deal<WH6213> with David<WH1732> my father<WH1>, and did send<WH7971> him cedars<WH730> to build<WH1129> him an house<WH1004> to live in it<WH3427>, even so deal with me.

Behold<WH1129>, I build an house<WH1004> to the name<WH8034> of the Lord<WH3068> my God<WH430>, to dedicate<WH6942> it to him<WH6999>, and to burn before<WH6440> him sweet<WH5561> incense<WH7004>, and for the continual<WH8548> showbread<WH4635>, and for the burnt offerings<WH5930> morning<WH1242> and evening<WH6153>, on the sabbaths<WH7676>, and on the new moons<WH2320>, and on the solemn feasts<WH4150> of the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430>. This is an ordinance for ever<WH5769> to Israel<WH3478>.
And the house<WH1004> which I build<WH1129> is great<WH1419>: for great<WH1419> is our God<WH430> above all gods<WH430>.

But who is able<WH6113> to build<WH1129> him a house<WH1004>, seeing the heaven<WH8064> and heaven<WH8064> of heavens<WH8064> cannot contain<WH3557> him<WH1129>? who am I then, that I should build him an house<WH1004>, save only<WH518> to burn sacrifice<WH6999> before him<WH6440>?

Send<WH7971> me now therefore a man<WH376> skillful<WH2450> to work<WH6213> in gold<WH2091>, and in silver<WH3701>, and in brass<WH5178>, and in iron<WH1270>, and in purple<WH710>, and crimson<WH3758>, and blue<WH8504>, and that has skill<WH3045> to engrave<WH6605> with the skillful men<WH2450> that are with me in Judah<WH3063> and in Jerusalem<WH3389>, whom David<WH1732> my father<WH1> did provide<WH3559>.

Send<WH7971> me also cedar<WH730> trees<WH6086>, fir trees<WH1265>, and algum trees<WH418>, out of Lebanon<WH3844>: for I know<WH3045> that your servants<WH5650> have skill<WH3045> to cut<WH3772> timber<WH6086> in Lebanon<WH3844>; and<WH5650>, behold, my servants shall be with your servants<WH5650>,
Even to prepare<WH3559> me timber<WH6086> in abundance<WH7230>: for the house<WH1004> which I am about to build<WH1129> shall be wonderfully<WH6381> great<WH1419>.

And<WH5414>, behold, I will give to your servants<WH5650>, the hewers<WH2404> that cut<WH3772> timber<WH6086>, twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> measures<WH3734> of beaten<WH4347> wheat<WH2406>, and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> measures<WH3734> of barley<WH8184>, and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> baths<WH1324> of wine<WH3196>, and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> baths<WH1324> of oil<WH8081>.

Then Huram<WH2361> the king<WH4428> of Tyre<WH6865> answered<WH559> in writing<WH3791>, which he sent<WH7971> to Solomon<WH8010>, Because the Lord<WH3068> has loved<WH160> his people<WH5971>, he has made<WH5414> you king over them<WH4428>.

Huram<WH2361> said<WH559> moreover<WH1288>, Blessed be the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, that made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776>, who has given<WH5414> to David<WH1732> the king<WH4428> a wise<WH2450> son<WH1121>, endowed<WH3045> with prudence<WH7922> and understanding<WH998>, that might build<WH1129> a house<WH1004> for the Lord<WH3068>, and a house<WH1004> for his kingdom<WH4438>.
And now I have sent<WH7971> a skillful<WH2450> man<WH376>, endowed<WH3045> with understanding<WH998>, of Huram<WH2361> my father<WH1>'s,

The son<WH1121> of a woman<WH802> of the daughters<WH1323> of Dan<WH1835>, and his father<WH1> was a man<WH376> of Tyre<WH6876>, skillful<WH3045> to work<WH6213> in gold<WH2091>, and in silver<WH3701>, in brass<WH5178>, in iron<WH1270>, in stone<WH68>, and in timber<WH6086>, in purple<WH713>, in blue<WH8504>, and in fine linen<WH948>, and in crimson<WH3758>; also to engrave<WH6605> any manner of graving<WH6603>, and to find out<WH2803> every device<WH4284> which shall be put<WH5414> to him<WH2450>, with your skillful men, and with the skillful men<WH2450> of my lord<WH113> David<WH1732> your father<WH1>.
Now therefore the wheat<WH2406>, and the barley<WH8184>, the oil<WH8081>, and the wine<WH3196>, which my lord<WH113> has spoken<WH559> of<WH7971>, let him send unto his servants<WH5650>:

And we will cut<WH3772> wood<WH6086> out of Lebanon<WH3844>, as much as you shall need<WH6878>: and we will bring<WH935> it to you in floats<WH7513> by sea<WH3220> to Joppa<WH3305>; and you shall carry it up<WH5927> to Jerusalem<WH3389>.

And Solomon<WH8010> numbered<WH5608> all the strangers<WH582> that were in the land<WH776> of Israel<WH3478>, after<WH310> the numbering<WH5610> with which David<WH1732> his father<WH1> had numbered<WH5608> them<WH4672>; and they were found an hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> thousand<WH505> and three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967>.

And he set<WH6213> sixty and ten<WH7657> thousand<WH505> of them to be bearers of burdens<WH5449>, and eighty<WH8084> thousand<WH505> to be hewers<WH2672> in the mountain<WH2022>, and three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> overseers<WH5329> to set<WH5647> the people<WH5971> a work<WH5647>.
